features.title: Uses postcss and sass with autoprefixer
Uses data from local json files
Contains Node.js server code for easy, secure, and fast hosting
SVG sprites: Add your icons in `components/icon` as .icon files and use them.

howTo.title: Run: `npm i` to install the dependencies

english: A person seen indistinctly or from a distance.
To reach an understanding of a person’s actions, motives, or personality.
To have a significant part or role in a situation or process.
A person of a particular kind, especially one who is important or distinctive.
A movement or series of movements following a prescribed pattern and often beginning and ending at the same point.
To think, consider, or expect to be the case.
To finally understand something or someone, or find the solution to a problem after a lot of thought.
A shape which is defined by one more lines in two dimensions, or one or more surfaces in three dimensions, either considered mathematically or used as a decorative design.
A diagram or illustrative drawing, especially in a book or magazine.
french: Donner d’un élément, une représentation qui en rende perceptible (surtout à la vue) l’aspect ou la nature caractéristique.
Façon dont un élément individualisé et structuré détache sur ce qui l’entoure.
Carte sur laquelle est représenté un personnage (roi, dame, valet).
Unité linguistique ou disposition d’unités linguistiques comportant un écart sensible par rapport à la norme ou l’usage.
Enchaînement de mouvement formant un tout (on distingue les figures libres et les figures imposées).
Dessin servant à visualiser certains êtresmathématiques et permettant, en particulier en géométrie, d’éclairer une démonstration.
Partie du corps considérée par rapport aux expressions qu’on y lit.
Toute illustration (schéma, dessin, photo) dans un ouvrage. (Abréviation : fig.).
